Directions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions; drain and place in a large bowl. Add the ham, soup, sour cream, mushrooms, onion, olives if desired, mustard, seasoned salt and Worcestershire sauce. Transfer to two greased 11-in. x 7-in. x 2-in. baking dishes.

In a bowl, toss bread crumbs and butter; add cheese. Sprinkle over casseroles. Cover and freeze one for up to 2 months. Bake the second casserole, uncovered, at 325 degrees F for 30 minutes or until heated through.
Ingredients: 1 (7 ounce) package spaghetti, broken into 2-inch pieces
2 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted
